scripts.build-ghost-rpc: cd ../../ghost-rpc/ && npm run build && cd ../ghost-rpc-fastify && npm run build
scripts.dev-full: concurrently --kill-others "cd api && npm start" "cd ui && npm run dev-full"
scripts.purge-node-modules:api: cd api && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.purge-node-modules:shared: cd shared && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.purge-node-modules:specs: cd specs && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.purge-node-modules:db: cd database && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
